Name: Zoning, Western Rail Yard Modifications, Manhattan (M 250100 LDM)
Title: Application No. M 250100 LDM (Western Rail Yards Modifications) submitted by WRY Tenant LLC, for the modification of Restrictive Declaration CRFN 2014000154631, to reflect certain project design revisions, related to property located at 300 Twelfth Avenue and 675 West 30th Street (Blocks 676, Lots 1 and 5), Borough of Manhattan, Community District 4, Council District 3.

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
